title: rustc-ap-rustc_index Fails to compile on ARM with the gcc linker

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Crate `rustc-ap-rustc_index` ### Meta `cross -Vv` ``` cargo 1.47.0-nightly (51b66125b 2020-08-19) release: 1.47.0 commit-hash: 51b66125ba97d2906f461b3f4e0408f206299bb6 commit-date: 2020-08-19 ``` `rustc -Vv` (idk how to get this from cross) ``` rustc 1.47.0-nightly (bf4342114 2020-08-25) binary: rustc commit-hash: bf4342114e357f2934d59e12e31e94532ddb2adf commit-date: 2020-08-25 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.47.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0 ``` ### Error output `cross build --target armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf --release` ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'src/librustc_resolve/imports.rs:907:25: inconsistent resolution for an import', /rustc/bf4342114e357f2934d59e12e31e94532ddb2adf/src/librustc_middle/util/bug.rs:34:26 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.47.0-nightly (bf4342114 2020-08-25) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C linker=arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden error: could not compile `rustc-ap-rustc_index`. Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name rustc_ap_rustc_index --edition=2018 /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rustc-ap-rustc_index-677.0.0/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C opt-level=3 -Cembed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=bd04023e3f851ad0 -C extra-filename=-bd04023e3f851ad0 --out-dir /target/armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf/release/deps --target armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf -C linker=arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc -L dependency=/target/armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf/release/deps -L dependency=/target/release/deps --extern arrayvec=/target/armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf/release/deps/libarrayvec-b98c7414863e3e8a.rmeta --extern rustc_macros=/target/release/deps/librustc_ap_rustc_macros-37d33213fa5718ca.so --extern rustc_serialize=/target/armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf/release/deps/librustc_ap_rustc_serialize-492d61b717736015.rmeta --cap-lints allow` (exit code: 101) ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'src/librustc_resolve/imports.rs:907:25: inconsistent resolution for an import', /rustc/bf4342114e357f2934d59e12e31e94532ddb2adf/src/librustc_middle/util/bug.rs:34:26 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fd4774be5a0 -
